name: ActivityFeedPage
desc:
A screen that displays a feed of lost and found items.
Allows users to report lost items, search for lost items, and chat about items.
The screen shows two tabs: Lost Items and Found Items.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: ActivityFeedPageState
desc: The state for ActivityFeedPage that manages the feed data and user interactions.

name: build
desc: Builds the main layout for the activity feed screen, which includes:

name: captureAndShareCard
desc: Captures an image of the lost or found item and shares it.

name: fetchItems
desc: Fetches lost and found items from the backend API.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: loadLanguage
desc: Loads the stored language preference from secure storage.

name: logout
desc: Logs out the user by clearing the session and navigating to the login screen.

name: AdminPage
desc:
The AdminPage widget provides an interface for the admin to view and approve lost items.
It fetches a list of lost items from the backend and displays them with options to approve or refresh the list.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: api_service
desc: An instance of the ApiService for making API calls.

name: approveItem
desc: Approves a specific lost item by sending a POST request to the backend.

name: base_url
desc: The base URL of the backend server.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: fetchLostItems
desc: Fetches the lost items from the backend and updates the state.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: is_loading
desc: A boolean flag to indicate if the lost items are loading.

name: lost_items
desc: A list of lost items fetched from the backend server.

name: showError
desc: Displays an error message in a snackbar.

name: showMessage
desc: Displays a success message in a snackbar.

name: ApiService
desc: A service class to handle API calls for user authentication, lost items, and email-related tasks.

name: STORAGE
desc: Instance of FlutterSecureStorage to store secure data like tokens.

name: base_url
desc: Base URL for the backend API.

name: login
desc: Logs in a user with their email and password.

name: logout
desc: Logs out the user by deleting their stored token.

name: markItemAsFound
desc: Marks an item as found by sending a request to the backend.

name: reportLostItem
desc: Reports a lost item by sending its description, location, and image to the backend.

name: searchLostItems
desc: Searches for lost items based on a query string.

name: sendEmails
desc: Sends emails related to lost items.

name: sendOtp
desc: Sends an OTP to the user's email.

name: signup
desc: Signs up a new user by sending their details to the backend.

name: verifyOtp
desc: Verifies the OTP entered by the user.

name: ChatPage
desc:
The ChatPage widget provides the interface for real-time communication between users.
It handles message sending, message retrieval, and periodic refresh of messages.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: STORAGE
desc: Secure storage for user data (e.g., email, receiver email).

name: addMessage
desc: Adds a new message to the chat UI.

name: base_url
desc: The server URL for API requests.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: current_receiver
desc: The email of the person being messaged (receiver).

name: dispose
desc: Called when this object is removed from the tree permanently.

name: handleSendPressed
desc: Handles the send button press by sending the message to the server.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: initializeUser
desc: Initializes the user and loads messages.

name: is_loading
desc: Loading indicator for the page.

name: loadMessages
desc: Loads messages from the server based on the current user and receiver.

name: message_timer
desc: Timer to periodically refresh messages.

name: messages
desc: List of messages to display in the chat.

name: sendMessageToServer
desc: Sends the message to the server.

name: startMessageRefresh
desc: Starts periodic message refresh every 5 seconds.

name: user
desc: The current user.

name: ChatPageList
desc:
ChatPageList is a StatefulWidget that displays a list of ongoing chats for the current user.
It fetches the list of chats from the backend and navigates to the ChatPage when a chat is tapped.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: STORAGE
desc: Secure storage used to persist data such as the user's email.

name: base_url
desc: The server URL for API requests.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: chats
desc: List to hold the ongoing chats fetched from the server.

name: curren_user_email
desc: Holds the current user's email.

name: fetchChats
desc: Fetches the list of ongoing chats from the backend.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: is_loading
desc: Loading state to show a loading indicator while fetching chat data.

name: ChangeStatusService
desc: A service class responsible for updating the status of lost items.

name: updateStatus
desc: Updates the is_found status of a lost item in the database.

name: AppLocalization
desc: A class that handles the localization of strings in different languages.

name: getString
desc:
Method to get the string for the given key and language code
Returns the localized string for the given key and language_code.

name: localized_values
desc: A map that stores localized strings for different languages.

name: LoginScreen
desc:
LoginScreen is a StatefulWidget that handles user login and OTP verification.
It provides functionality for remembering user credentials, submitting login details,
and verifying OTP sent to the userâ€™s email.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: STORAGE
desc: Secure storage used to persist sensitive data, such as email and language preference.

name: api_service
desc: The ApiService instance used to interact with the backend.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: checkIfUserRemembered
desc:
Checks if the user's email exists in secure storage,
and if it does, redirects to the ActivityFeedPage.

name: email
desc: The email entered by the user.

name: form_key
desc: The global key used for form validation.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: language
desc: The currently selected language (default is English).

name: loadLanguage
desc: Loads the preferred language from secure storage.

name: login
desc: Handles user login.

name: otp
desc: Stores the OTP entered by the user for verification.

name: password
desc: The password entered by the user.

name: remember_me
desc: Tracks whether the "Remember Me" checkbox is selected.

name: showOtpDialog
desc: Displays an OTP verification dialog where the user can input the OTP sent to their email.

name: showResponseDialog
desc: Displays a response dialog with a custom message.

name: HomeScreen
desc: The home screen of the app, where users can navigate to login or signup pages.

name: HomeScreen
desc: Constructor for HomeScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: STORAGE
desc: Instance of FlutterSecureStorage to persist language preferences securely.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: language
desc: Stores the current language code (en for English, bd for Bengali).

name: loadLanguage
desc: Loads the user's preferred language from secure storage.

name: toggleLanguage
desc: Toggles the language between English (en) and Bengali (bd) and updates secure storage.

name: MyApp
desc: The root widget of the application.

name: MyApp
desc: Constructor for MyApp.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: main
desc: The main entry point of the application.

name: NotificationService
desc: A service that handles notification operations using the Awesome Notifications package.

name: initializeNotifications
desc: Initializes the Awesome Notifications package.

name: sendNotification
desc: Sends a notification with two action buttons.

name: ReportLostItemScreen
desc:
A screen for reporting a lost item. It allows users to input a description,
location, and an image of the lost item, which is then submitted to the backend.

name: ReportLostItemScreen
desc: Creates a new instance of the ReportLostItemScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: STORAGE
desc: An instance of FlutterSecureStorage to securely store user preferences.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: description_controller
desc: Controller for the description text field.

name: image
desc: Holds the selected image file of the lost item.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: language
desc: The language code for localization (default is 'en').

name: loadLanguage
desc: Loads the user's preferred language from secure storage.

name: location_controller
desc: Controller for the location text field.

name: pickImage
desc: Picks an image from the specified source (camera or gallery).

name: picker
desc: An instance of ImagePicker to pick images from the camera or gallery.

name: submitReport
desc: Submits the lost item report.

name: SearchLostItemsScreen
desc: A screen for searching lost items by entering a query in a search bar.

name: SearchLostItemsScreen
desc: Creates a new instance of SearchLostItemsScreen.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: STORAGE
desc: An instance of FlutterSecureStorage to securely store user preferences.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: is_loading
desc: A boolean that indicates whether the search is in progress.

name: language
desc: The language code for localization (default is 'en').

name: loadLanguage
desc: Loads the user's preferred language from secure storage.

name: query_controller
desc: Controller for the search query text field.

name: searchItems
desc: Searches for lost items based on the entered query.

name: search_results
desc: A list of search results containing information about the lost items.

name: SignupScreen
desc:
SignupScreen is a StatefulWidget that handles the user sign-up process.
It provides a form for users to enter their name, email, password, NSU ID,
and phone number, and handles submission of the sign-up request to the server.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: STORAGE
desc: Secure storage used to persist sensitive data such as the preferred language.

name: api_service
desc: The ApiService instance used to interact with the backend API for sign-up.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: email
desc: User's email entered during sign-up.

name: form_key
desc: The global key used for form validation.

name: initState
desc: Called when this object is inserted into the tree.

name: language
desc: The current selected language (default is English).

name: loadLanguage
desc: Loads the preferred language from secure storage.

name: name
desc: User's name entered during sign-up.

name: nsu_id
desc: User's NSU ID entered during sign-up.

name: password
desc: User's password entered during sign-up.

name: phone_number
desc: User's phone number entered during sign-up.

name: showResponseDialog
desc: Displays a response dialog with a custom message.

name: signup
desc: Handles user sign-up.
